dchrvmasumiflem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. RR+ |-> sum_ d e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( ( ( X ` ( L ` d ) ) x. ( ( mmu ` d ) / d ) ) x. ( sum_ k e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( x / d ) ) ) ( ( X ` ( L ` k ) ) x. ( ( log ` if ( S = 0 , ( x / d ) , k ) ) / k ) ) - if ( S = 0 , 0 , T ) ) ) ) e. O(1) ) $.
